mapper.select: SELECT mm.myMachineNo, mm.custNo, mm.gymNo, mm.machineNo, gm.machineName, gm.machineImgname, gm.holdingQuantity, gm.usingQuantity FROM mymachine mm JOIN GYMMACHINE gm ON mm.machineNo = gm.machineNo WHERE mm.custNo = #{custNo} AND mm.myMachineStatus = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE mymachine SET myMachineStatus = '0' WHERE myMachineNo=#{myMachineNo}
